properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V HAWK EXPLORER TOWING 
   12000 METER LONG CABLES:
   A. 07 MAR ALONG TRACKLINE JOINING
      31-51.37S 050-03.28W, 27-51.49S 045-41.48W,
      32-43.49S 050-25.39W.
   B. 08 THRU 12 MAR ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN 
      27-51.49S 045-41.48W AND 32-43.49S 050-25.39W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 546/13.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 13 MAR 13.
